mapper.select: SELECT /* SearchKeywordMapper.xml, getThemeRandomId, SAC-전시기타/심대진/다모아솔루션, 2015-09-04 */ SEARCH_ID FROM ( SELECT B.SEARCH_ID FROM TB_DP_SEARCH A, TB_DP_SEARCH_KEYWORD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.SEARCH_ID = B.SEARCH_ID AND A.STD_DT = B.STD_DT AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.SEARCH_CLSF_CD = #{searchClsfCd} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY B.SEARCH_ID ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
